document_data.caption: A map of the Shining Lands with Esbresh marked.
document_data.name: Esbresh
document_data.mainbody:
'''Esbresh''' was a settlement near the [[Utter East]] and [[Ulgarth]] in [[southeast Faerûn]], lying on the shore of the [[Great Sea]].

There was a certain slaving ring based out of [[Luskan]] in far [[northwest Faerûn]], fronted by one [[Inther Blackfeather]], that reached all the way to Esbresh and [[Kelazzan]].<ref><ref>
